item.title: Notes: Zimmerman. (1986). Development of a structured interview for assessing student use of self-regulated learning strategies
item.description: References Citekey: @Zimmerman1986-vd Zimmerman, B. J., & Pons, M. M. (1986). Development of a structured interview for assessing student use of self-regulated learning strategies. American Educational Research Journal, 23(4), 614â€“628. Notes Highlights High achieving students displayed significantly greater use of 13 cate- gories of self-regulated learning (p. 1) Recently, several theoretical articles have sought to relate various views of self-regulated learning to academic moti- vation and achievement (Corno & Mandinach, 1983; McCombs, 1984; Schunk, 1984).
